review: Surprisingly easy to hook up. Connects to programs very fast. The voice feature works a lot better than I expected, it's not necessary to clearly enunciate each word, just speak normally. author: Mike P

review: I'm very happy with the Fire TV - although I wish it did even more!  The streaming is smooth and fast, and the content is excellent!  I particularly like being able to watch the Amazon Studios original series on a bigger screen!  Mozart in the Jungle is not to be missed! I do wish that there were more capability to search and buy (or select) music from the Fire TV, but it's easy enough to go to my computer and download it - once it's on my computer it's accessible on the Fire.  It's easy to set up and comes already registered (if you're a prime member).  I've watched more movies and TV in the past four or five days than I have in the past two months.  All in all it was a really good purchase at $99 - and from what I just saw, you might be able to get it for $79!
author: Ann
